content: Try Cookie Bombing? Read more about it LINK(https://book.hacktricks.xyz/pentesting-web/hacking-with-cookies/cookie-bomb). Taking CVSS_CHANGE would change your CVSS score to NEW_CVSS_SCORE
Try to perform this attack on low-privileged account. Taking CVSS_CHANGE would change your CVSS score to NEW_CVSS_SCORE
Try to modify user settings that could lead to bricking user accounts. Taking CVSS_CHANGE would change your CVSS score to NEW_CVSS_SCORE
Can you leak highly sensitive info about the user? (SSN, API keys, other PII) Taking CVSS_CHANGE would change your CVSS score to NEW_CVSS_SCORE
Can you escalate to ATO via leaked session/APItoken/cookie? Taking CVSS_CHANGE would change your CVSS score to NEW_CVSS_SCORE
Can you escalate to ATO via changing email? Taking CVSS_CHANGE would change your CVSS score to NEW_CVSS_SCORE
Can you escalate to ATO via changing password? Taking CVSS_CHANGE would change your CVSS score to NEW_CVSS_SCORE
Can you escalate to ATO via changing phone number? Taking CVSS_CHANGE would change your CVSS score to NEW_CVSS_SCORE
Can you escalate to ATO via adding admin user? Taking CVSS_CHANGE would change your CVSS score to NEW_CVSS_SCORE
Can you escalate to ATO via leaking OAuth token? Taking CVSS_CHANGE would change your CVSS score to NEW_CVSS_SCORE
Can you escalate to ATO via adding SSO login (login with GitHub, etc)? Taking CVSS_CHANGE would change your CVSS score to NEW_CVSS_SCORE
Can you escalate to ATO via SMS password reset? Taking CVSS_CHANGE would change your CVSS score to NEW_CVSS_SCORE

If you are on a CMS with editing of Extensions (eg: Wordpress) you can get an RCE through XSS by adding a reverse shell in their backend. Read more about it LINK(https://twitter.com/0xLupin/status/1683160239988719616). Taking CVSS_CHANGE would change your CVSS score to NEW_CVSS_SCORE

See if you can provide an invalid value (such as an object when the application was expecting a string) to break the component for the target user. Taking CVSS_CHANGE would change your CVSS score to NEW_CVSS_SCORE

Is your SSRF in a headless browser? You may be able to affect Availability for other users by crashing the browser by issuing too many requests or by utilizing a crashing PoC vulnerability found through the Chromium issues tracker. Taking CVSS_CHANGE would change your CVSS score to NEW_CVSS_SCORE

If the SSRF is an image-only SSRF, attempt to look for favicons or logos of known internal software. This could help bump your confidentiality metric! Taking CVSS_CHANGE would change your CVSS score to NEW_CVSS_SCORE

If the database is misconfigured, you could gain an Local File Read. learn more about it LINK(https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ClnVdYf4PK0). Taking CVSS_CHANGE would change your CVSS score to NEW_CVSS_SCORE

If the database is misconfigured, you could gain an os shell. Read more about it LINK(https://aditya-chauhan17.medium.com/sql-injection-to-rce-dd538d49a7f) or LINK(https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ClnVdYf4PK0). Taking CVSS_CHANGE would change your CVSS score to NEW_CVSS_SCORE

If this HTMLI is in PDF generator, you can get RCE or SSRF. Read more about it LINK(https://blog.appsecco.com/finding-ssrf-via-html-injection-inside-a-pdf-file-on-aws-ec2-214cc5ec5d90). Taking CVSS_CHANGE would change your CVSS score to NEW_CVSS_SCORE

Is it possible to include the `style` or `class` attribute within HTML? If so, it could be used to overlay a victim's screen with malicious content. Read more about it LINK(https://blog.appsecco.com/finding-ssrf-via-html-injection-inside-a-pdf-file-on-aws-ec2-214cc5ec5d90). Taking CVSS_CHANGE would change your CVSS score to NEW_CVSS_SCORE
